name: Imaging Report TEST THEN DELETE
query:
SELECT 
    r.patient AS "Patient:Data:150",
    r.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:200", 
    r.date AS "Date:Data:100", 
    COALESCE(S.oustside, r.practitioner) AS "Doctor:Data:300", 
    
    r.section AS "Section:Data:200", 
    r.eximination AS "Examination:Data:200", 
    r.source_order AS "Source order:Data:120",
    u.full_name AS "Cashier Name:Data:200"
FROM 
    `tabRadiology` r
JOIN 
    `tabUser` u ON r.owner = u.name 
LEFT JOIN 
        `tabSales Invoice` S ON r.reff_invoice = S.name

WHERE
    r.date BETWEEN %(from)s AND %(to)s 
    AND r.docstatus = 1;
